title: BBC Local Live: Northamptonshire for Tuesday, 22 March 2016 - BBC News
summary: a man has been arrested for murder following the death of a woman in agnes road , northampton last night .
more than 660 youngsters in northamptonshire were reported being sexually assaulted last year , up from 432 the year before .
news , sport , weather and travel updates resume at 08:00 on wednesday .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: thanks for joining us today .
we 'll be back tomorrow from 18:00 with all the latest news , sport , weather and travel from across northamptonshire .

documents.title: weather : clear tonight , chance of rain tomorrow .
text: it 's going to remain dry through this evening and overnight with some patchy amounts of cloud and a low of 4c ( 39f ) .
tomorrow it will be a chilly but bright start , but with the odd spot of rain later and a high of 11c ( 52f ) .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: robber had knife during raid of coral bookmakers
text: one of three people who stole cash from a kettering bookmakers yesterday wielded a large black coloured , wooden handled knife .
the armed robbery took place at coral in london road at 20:20 .
one of the men , who had a grey face covering , jumped over the counter and demanded money , before the three ran out the store , and turned left down silverwood road .
author: Sarah Foster
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: poppies hoping to get closer to the playoffs with game-in-hand win
text: kettering town can close the gap to the play-off places this evening .
they 're at home to stratford town in the southern league premier division .
the poppies are currently eighth , seven points of fifth place hitchin town but with two games in hand .
author: Graham McKechnie
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: corby circus classes to teach 'very popular ' aerial skills
text: the woman behind the new circus skills classes in corby says skills such as trapeze , hoop and silks would be `` accessible to everybody '' .
nikki hammond is a performing arts graduate from corby and founder of the corby circus classes .
she told me : `` aerial skills are very popular in the uk but around northamptonshire we lack the skills . ''
author: Carroll Weston
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: headlines : man arrested on sus of murder armed robbery at kettering bookmakers
text: if you 're catching up , here are the top stories :
author: Sarah Foster
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: travel : queues on the a5199 due to a14 closure between catthorpe and junction 1
text: there are queues on the a5199 both ways due to the closure of the a14 between junction 1 and the catthorpe interchange both ways .
highways england says there are also reports of a large fuel spell and shed load on the a14 .
they say the road is likely to remain closed into the `` evening peak period '' .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: police looking for birmingham man say he has links to northampton
text: police are searching for a missing west midlands man who is believed to have links to northampton .
james pinsent , 43 , is said to be vulnerable as he suffers from mental health issues .
he went missing from his birmingham home on monday .
mr pinsent is 6'2 and was wearing an olive jacket , beige jumper and jeans .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: a14 closed in both directions between catthorpe and junction 1
text: the a14 is closed in both directions between the catthorpe interchange and junction 1 ( a5199 ) because of accident investigation work .
# a14 e/b btwn # m6/ # m1 - j1 .
@ twitterid have cut central barrier for us so we can get traffic stuck in closed section released .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: support for calls to make a43 safer grows after yet another crash near kettering
text: a petition to make the nine-mile stretch of the a43 between kettering and northampton safer has attracted almost 4,500 signatures - in the same week as another crash on the road .
author: Northamptonshire Telegraph

documents.title: four hour waits prompt hospital use warning
text: northampton hospital yesterday experienced one of its busiest days on record , with more than 350 people attended it 's a & e department - the highest level in two years , with the average wait time to see an a & e doctor at four hours .

the nhs nene clinical commissioning group , which looks after healthcare for much of northamptonshire , said a & e `` should only be used for critical or life-threatening situations requiring medical attention '' .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: women has 'life changing injuries ' after crash caused by puncture
text: a woman has suffered `` life changing injuries '' after a crash near junction 15 of the m1 southbound on saturday .
the 20-year-old was a passenger in a blue vauxhall corsa which suffered a puncture , causing the driver to lose control and come to a stop on an embankment at 10:00 .
the driver , a 22-year-old man , and two other passengers , two women , aged 20 and 21 , suffered minor injuries .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: one letter of support against 552 objections but northampton shop plan likely to go ahead
text: unpopular plans to turn a northampton pub into a convenience store are on the verge of being approved tonight - despite 552 objection letters against it , a petition and two protection bids .
author: Northampton Chronicle & Echo

documents.title: more children reporting sexual abuse as they are more confident in coming forward , expert says
text: the number of young people in the county who report being sexually assaulted has risen to 660 in the last year - up from 432 the year before .

but laura knight , the director of the institute for public safety , crime and justice , told a child sexual exploitation conference in corby today that the increase is down to youngsters being more confident in coming forward .
she said : `` we are building up our understanding and the more we can do to get children and young people to come forward the better . ''
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: shakespeare on tour : iconic performance of king john in northampton
text: ahead of the 400th anniversary of shakespeare 's death next month , the bbc is looking at 'shakespeare on tour ' as it investigate the bard 's links to the various part of the country including northamptonshire .
shakespeare 's king john is partly set in northampton , at a point in its history when it was just emerging as a great thoroughfare .
the town was home to a castle where king john set himself up .

last year , the royal & derngate partnered with shakespeare 's globe to mark the magna carta 's 800th anniversary with a production of king john that played at the holy sepulchre in northampton , which was visited often by king john and his court .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: pcc says children as young as 10 need to learn about relationships
text: the government needs to have the kind of education `` that does n't just talk about reproduction , but also talks about how to manage a relationship , '' according to northamptonshire 's police and crime commissioner , adam simmonds .
mr simmonds , who is today hosting a conference in corby on child exploitation , said `` children as young as 10 feel they are in a relationship '' and sex education should reflect that .
it follows a survey of 2,700 young people aged between 10-18 in northamptonshire about their intimate relationships .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: blaming brussels attack on mass immigration 'appalling , ' says labour mep
text: it is `` appalling '' an east midlands mep has blamed today 's attacks in brussels on `` mass immigration '' - that 's according to labour 's euro-mp for the region , glenis willmott .
she was responding to comments from ukip 's roger helmer , who said `` a small number of jihadis '' had entered europe .
dame willmott , the leader of the european parliamentary labour party , said `` now is n't the time to be making those kind of political points , '' .
but pointed out that salah abdeslam , a suspect in last year 's paris attacks who was arrested in belgium last week , is a french national .
she added the attacks in brussels were `` horrendous '' and that was trying to reach a friend but `` had n't been able to contact her yet '' .
author: Sam Read
BBC Radio Northampton politics reporter

documents.title: reports of an accident on the a14 eastbound
text: david has been in touch to say there are delays eastbound on the a14 just before junction 1 at welford because of an accident involving two lorries .
also there is disruption in northampton town centre due to roadworks on spencer bridge road .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: girl wakes up bound in wires and with knife in leg after horrific attack at her northampton home
text: a traumatised northampton girl was left horrified when she woke up on the kitchen floor of her house with a knife sticking out of a her leg , cable wire wrapped around her mouth , wrist and ankles , and no way of escaping .
author: Northants Herald & Post

documents.title: train ticket restrictions relaxed following brussels attacks
text: east midland trains , which run from corby , kettering and wellingborough , have issued this advice to anyone due to travel via st. pancras to belgium

documents.title: headlines : man arrested on sus of murder pcc calls for better education on relationships
text: here are your lunchtime headlines :
author: Sarah Foster
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: weather : sunny spells but also cloud later
text: there are blue skies in many parts of northamptonshire , such as in pattishall as captured by bbc weather watcher 'paulamaria ' .
the weather will continue to be dry this afternoon , but it will become cloudy with a top temperature of 11c ( 52f ) .
you can find more details on the bbc weather website .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: extraordinary meeting tonight over future of wellingborough 's castle theatre
text: an extraordinary meeting to discuss future plans for a town theatre is taking place tonight .
author: Northamptonshire Telegraph

documents.title: jimmy 's store cordoned off
text: a resident of agnes road has told the bbc that jimmy 's store on the corner of arnold road and kingsthorpe road has been cordoned off because a man connected to the victim visited it yesterday afternoon .
police were called to a house on agnes road in northampton yesterday at 19.30 after a woman was seriously injured .
the women subsequently died and a man has been arrested on sus of murder .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: mep says brussels is 'centre of terrorist activity in europe '
text: an mep has blamed `` mass immigration , which has allowed a small number of jihadis to enter europe '' for this morning 's attack in brussels .
roger helmer , who represents the east midlands , said : `` brussels appears to be the centre of terrorist activity in europe . ''

the ukip member said he is in his office in the european parliament building in brussels , but one his staff passed close to one of the bombs at a metro station and is `` not injured , but is a bit shaken '' .
author: Sam Read
BBC Radio Northampton politics reporter

documents.title: only six schools have crossing patrols , but majority of parents want them
text: northamptonshire has just six schools with lollipop men and women , following the withdrawal of county council funding for the service back in 2010 .
the patrols now have to be paid for directly by the schools , or by community groups or parents prepared to fund-raise .
in a recent national study , 95 % of parents said they felt safer knowing their children are being shown across the road .
author: Sam Read
BBC Radio Northampton politics reporter

documents.title: man arrested after women dies on agnes road in northampton
text: a man has been arrested on sus of murder following the death of a woman at an address in agnes road , northampton last night .
police were called by paramedics at 19.30 yesterday to reports of a woman having been seriously injured .
she died a short time later .
a 41-year-old man from northampton , who was known to the woman , was arrested on sus of murder last night and is currently being held at the criminal justice centre .
a forensic post mortem examination is set to take place at leicester royal infirmary later today .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: breakingman arrested on sus of murder after agnes road incident
text: a man has been arrested on sus of murder following the death of a woman at an address in agnes road , semilong , northampton last night .

documents.title: police , ambulance and forensics on agnes road last night
text: this was scene on agnes road last night at around 23:00
police say they are still investigating a `` serious incident '' and the property remains cordoned off , as is jimmy 's store on the corner of agnes road and barrack road .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: east midlands mep 'shocked and stunned ' by attacks in brussels
text: conservative member for the east midlands , emma mcclarkin mep , has told the bbc she is `` shocked and stunned '' by this morning 's attacks in brussels .

mr mcclarkin said she `` completely condemned these cowardly acts of terrorism , '' adding that her thoughts `` are with those who have been caught up in these attacks , and with the families of those who have been killed '' .
she added : `` the security forces must redouble their efforts to prevent attacks and keep innocent people safe from those who want to remove our freedom and destroy our way of life . ''
author: Sam Read
BBC Radio Northampton politics reporter

documents.title: hartley says he wishes he could remember lifting six nations trophy
text: northampton saints hooker and england captain dylan hartley has said he can not remember lifting the six nations trophy .
hartley , writing in the sun newspaper , said he could n't remember the celebrations after being knocked out in the final minutes of the game .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: only three percent of young people would tell police about abuse in relationships
text: ahead of conference on child sexual exploitation at the corby cube today the police and crime commissioner , adam simmonds commissioned a survey into intimate relationships of 10-18-year-olds in northamptonshire .
the survey spoke to 2,700 young people
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: two properties cordoned off on agnes road in northampton
text: this is the scene at jimmy 's store on the corner of arnold road and kingsthorpe road in northampton where police were called to last night
police have also cordoned off a property on agnes road
author: Martin Borley
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: man who worked to get the best for daventry passes away
text: a businessman and former councillor who tried to enhance daventry while protecting its history has died .
author: Daventry Express

documents.title: police investigating an incident on agnes road in northampton
text: northamptonshire police were called to an incident on agnes road in northampton at around 23:00 last night .
officers say they are continuing their investigations at a property this morning , but the road is open .
we 'll bring you more on this when we get it .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: sexual assaults on young people on the increase
text: more than 660 youngsters in northamptonshire reported being sexually assaulted last year - up from 432 the year before .
northamptonshire police will be talking about its role in tackling child sexual exploitation at a conference at the corby cube today .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: headlines : number of youngsters sexually assaulted rising just six schools have crossing patrols
text: here are our top stories :
author: Martin Heath
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: weather : mostly dry with sunny spells
text: the best of the sunny spells will be this morning , as cloud will tend to increase through the day with a top temperature of 11c ( 52f ) .
you can find more details on the bbc weather website or see my full forecast below
author: Kate Kinsella
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: good morning and welcome to local live for northamptonshire
text: hello again .
we are here in the bbc newsroom in northampton bringing you the day 's news , the latest sport , up-to-date travel and detailed weather forecasts , until 18:00 tonight .
if you want to contact us then please email me , tweet us or head to facebook .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live
